## Forest Rights and Local Planning

We conduct extensive stakeholder meetings to support forest governance, strengthen Gram Sabha institutions, and prepare 10-year CFR micro-plans.

<img src="cfr stakeholder meeting.JPG" width="500">

## Women's Participation in Planning and Governance

We foster discussion and leadership among Adivasi women around farming, decision-making, and local self-governance.

<img src="women discission group.jpg" width="500">

## Sustainable Livelihoods and Agro-Ecology

We promote value-added, sustainable agriculture rooted in traditional practices and biodiversity.
